catalog_info.title: Introductory Fiction: Workshop
catalog_info.notes: Admission based on submitted samples of writing. For information on specific application requirements, please see the English Department's Creative Writing web page.
catalog_info.description: In this introductory fiction workshop you will practice and discuss many phases of the writing process--note taking, drafting, revising and offering feedback--so that you can continue to develop your own process and discipline.
